verses.name: Luke 8:26
verses.text: And they arrived at the country of the Gadarenes, which is over against Galilee.

verses.name: Luke 8:27
verses.text: And when he went forth to land, there met him out of the city a certain man, which had devils long time, and ware no clothes, neither abode in any house, but in the tombs.

verses.name: Luke 8:28
verses.text: When he saw Jesus, he cried out, and fell down before him, and with a loud voice said, What have I to do with thee, Jesus, thou Son of God most high? I beseech thee, torment me not.
